title: adidas Skateboarding Lucas & Friends Roadtrip
description:
In June of 2012 Lucas Puig and a few of his friends embarked on a roadtrip through the south of France showcasing his new pro model. 
Official Website: http://www.adidas.com/skateboarding 
Store Locator: http://bit.ly/qIFMfO
